Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: (\{ "When you're participating in a Skotos game or Theatre, you'll normally be communicating In Character (IC). To say something IC type ' followed by your message. Typing 'Greetings, friend!, would read as: You say, \\"Greetings, friend!\\" To whisper, type WHISPER [TARGET] \\"[MESSAGE]\\". Typing whisper to Jane \\"You are very lovely, Jane.\\" would read as: You whisper to Jane, \\"You are very lovely Jane.\\"" \})
(\{ "I can tell you about the following topics: OOC, IC, Communicating, Movement, or the Concept of the world of ICO." \})
